Text: WDTV Live users, avoid this file as the WDTV Live apparently doesn't have the right audio codecs, there is no sounds but it plays fine on my computer.  Video looks great though.

@farkstick
I'm sorry about it not working on your WDTV. When I test the files I only do so, firstly on my laptop and then on my Nationite HDVP-2.
